item.description:
Lets all gather and do some fun stuff like dancing to a great live rock band that brings a pretty good following from what I have seen, remember dancing and more dancing and a way to meet new people, singles, couples or groups it does not matter , we always have a good time no matter where we go.

I'd say get there by at least 7:30 for dinner, if you'd like...or just come to dance later, for a great band Mama Kicks...and this place is very new and spacious, plenty of TVs for your viewing pleasure, separate dining, big bar and decent dance floor. come meet, greet and even eat, than dance off a few pounds.

Giant Screen TV's, Great Food & Drink. I will have a Meet Up sign on the table, will try to be close to the band.


Band: Mama Kicks


Scoreboard Sports Bar and Grill
Place page

15 Middlesex Canal Park
Woburn, MA 01801
(781) 897-400

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Rock Your Night "Mama Kicks" Band.
